name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
summary: Raj and Simran, two young non-resident Indians, fall in love during a European trip. However, Simran's conservative father has already arranged her marriage to another man.

name: Swades
summary: A NASA scientist returns to India to find his childhood nanny and, in the process, rediscovers his roots and works to improve the village’s living conditions.

name: Devdas
summary: A wealthy law graduate returns from London to marry his childhood sweetheart but is met with rejection, leading him into a downward spiral of self-destruction.

name: Chak De! India
summary: A disgraced hockey player turned coach struggles to bring together a group of underdog women to lead the Indian national team to victory.

name: My Name Is Khan
summary: An autistic Muslim man embarks on a cross-country journey in the U.S. to meet the President and clear his name after being wrongfully targeted post-9/11.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
summary: A kind-hearted man embarks on a journey to reunite a mute Pakistani girl with her family across the border, overcoming numerous challenges along the way.

name: Sultan
summary: A former wrestling champion struggles with personal loss and makes a comeback to regain his lost respect and love.

name: Tiger Zinda Hai
summary: RAW agent Tiger and Pakistani spy Zoya come out of hiding to rescue hostages held by a terrorist organization in Iraq.

name: Kick
summary: A man who finds thrill in life’s challenges turns into a masked vigilante to help the needy while being chased by the police.

name: Wanted
summary: A sharpshooter working for the mafia is caught between the law and crime, hiding a deeper secret about his real identity.

name: 3 Idiots
summary: Two friends embark on a journey to find their long-lost college buddy, recalling their college days and the unconventional ways of their friend who inspired them to think differently.

name: Dangal
summary: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers, challenging societal norms and proving the power of determination.

name: Lagaan
summary: In colonial India, a small village fights against unjust taxation by challenging British officers to a game of cricket.

name: Taare Zameen Par
summary: An art teacher helps a dyslexic child discover his hidden potential, transforming his life and boosting his confidence.

name: Ghajini
summary: A man suffering from short-term memory loss seeks revenge against the murderer of his beloved, using tattoos and notes to track his target.

name: Koi Mil Gaya
summary: A developmentally disabled young man befriends an extraterrestrial being, leading to magical changes in his life.

name: Krrish
summary: A young man gifted with superhuman abilities discovers his destiny as a superhero while protecting the world from a powerful villain.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary: Three childhood friends embark on a road trip across Spain that changes their perspectives on life, love, and friendship.

name: War
summary: An elite Indian soldier is assigned to track down his former mentor, who has gone rogue.

name: Super 30
summary: The inspiring story of mathematician Anand Kumar, who helps underprivileged students crack India's toughest engineering entrance exam.

name: Barfi!
summary: A charming mute and deaf man navigates life and love while facing challenges with a heart full of joy and optimism.

name: Sanju
summary: A biopic on Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt, chronicling his rise to fame, struggles with addiction, and legal troubles.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
summary: A free-spirited traveler and an ambitious medical student cross paths, shaping each other's lives in unexpected ways.

name: Rockstar
summary: A young musician's journey from heartbreak to fame, as he struggles with love, success, and self-destruction.

name: Brahmāstra: Part One – Shiva
summary: A young man discovers his mystical powers and embarks on a journey to unlock the secrets of an ancient weapon that could change the world.

name: Guru
summary: A determined man rises from a small village to become a powerful business tycoon, facing obstacles and controversies along the way.

name: Dhoom
summary: A determined cop teams up with a bike mechanic to track down a gang of high-speed robbers led by a mysterious mastermind.

name: Bunty Aur Babli
summary: Two ambitious dreamers turn to con artistry to achieve their goals, leading to a series of hilarious and thrilling escapades.

name: Manmarziyaan
summary: A complex love triangle unfolds as a woman must choose between her passionate past and a stable, mature love.

name: Dostana
summary: Two friends pretend to be a gay couple to secure an apartment, but things get complicated when they both fall for their roommate.

name: Padmaavat
summary: A powerful sultan becomes obsessed with the beauty and grace of Queen Padmavati, leading to a fierce battle for honor and love.

name: Bajirao Mastani
summary: A fearless Maratha warrior faces personal and political challenges as he falls in love with a Rajput princess despite his existing marriage.

name: Gully Boy
summary: A young man from the slums of Mumbai follows his passion for rap music and rises against all odds to become a voice for the streets.

name: Simmba
summary: A corrupt police officer has a change of heart after a brutal crime, setting him on a path of justice and redemption.
The incredible true story of India's underdog victory at the 1983 Cricket World Cup, led by captain Kapil Dev.

name: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
summary: A brave Maratha warrior fights to reclaim a strategic fortress from a ruthless Mughal commander to protect his homeland.

name: Omkara
summary: A political enforcer is consumed by jealousy and betrayal, leading to a tragic downfall in this adaptation of Shakespeare's Othello.

name: Sacred Games
summary: A Mumbai police officer uncovers a dark conspiracy linked to a criminal mastermind, setting off a high-stakes cat-and-mouse chase.

name: Love Aaj Kal
summary: A modern-day love story unfolds in parallel with a romance from the past, showing how love and relationships evolve over time.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
summary: A love triangle unfolds as a man falls for his best friend, while another mysterious man brings happiness into their lives.

name: Ishaqzaade
summary: A love story between two rebellious individuals from rival political families, battling against societal norms and family feuds.

name: Gunday
summary: Two inseparable friends rise from being refugees to powerful coal mafias, but their bond is tested when love enters their lives.

name: 2 States
summary: A Punjabi boy and a Tamilian girl fall in love, but their journey to convince their culturally different families is full of challenges.

name: Ki & Ka
summary: A progressive couple challenges gender stereotypes as the husband manages the home while the wife pursues her career.

name: Half Girlfriend
summary: A small-town boy falls for a rich Delhi girl, who is hesitant to commit, leading to a complicated and emotional journey of love and loss.

name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
summary: Based on true events, an Indian Army special forces unit avenges a deadly terrorist attack with a meticulously planned surgical strike.

name: Masaan
summary: Two separate stories of love, loss, and redemption unfold in the ghats of Varanasi, exploring social taboos and personal struggles.

name: Sardar Udham
summary: The gripping story of revolutionary Udham Singh, who avenged the Jallianwala Bagh massacre by assassinating Michael O'Dwyer in London.

name: Raazi
summary: A young Indian woman is trained as a spy and marries into a Pakistani military family to gather intelligence before the 1971 war.

name: Sanju
summary: A biopic on Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt, showcasing his struggles, controversies, and journey through fame and hardship.
